summary: Feature request to allow overriding the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow, similar to the capability available when creating a Workflow from a client. This enables pre-deployment testing scenarios.
userImpact: Users cannot test pre-deployment versions when using child workflows, limiting their testing capabilities before deployment.
proposedFix: Allow overriding the target version on a child workflow invocation using the same mechanism available for client-initiated workflows.
keyQuote: Users want to override the target version on a workflow, especially when doing pre-deployment testing.
